setUpdatedDate

protected void setUpdatedDate(Item item,
                              VerboseDescription verboseDescription)
                       throws DSpaceSwordException
Add the current date to the item metadata. This looks up the field in which to store this metadata in the configuration sword.updated.field

Parameters:
item -
Throws:
DSpaceSwordException

setSlug

protected void setSlug(Item item,
                       java.lang.String slugVal,
                       VerboseDescription verboseDescription)
                throws DSpaceSwordException
Store the given slug value (which is used for suggested identifiers, and which DSpace ignores) in the item metadata. This looks up the field in which to store this metadata in the configuration sword.slug.field

Parameters:
item -
slugVal -
Throws:
DSpaceSwordException
